response.overview: Bloodlust Cerene is the second 3D porn series from miro and Affect3D. The team previously responsible for Girlfriends 4 Ever has created a sexy, new story set in a fantasy world. This 3DX animation follows the headstrong Prince Tristan as he tries to save his kingdom from the reprecussions of an ancient blood pact. In the first half, the prince's fianc√©e, Sophia, begs him not to go while giving him several inviting reasons to stay. In the secound half, Tristan sets out to confront the vampires holding his people at a knife's point but is shocked to discover their leader is a sexy but sinister vampiress named Cerene. How can he hope to stop her when all he wants to do is fuck her?
response.title: Bloodlust: Cerene
